trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioStateChanged" name="AudioStateChanged" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Предоставляет данные для <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioStateChanged" name="AudioStateChanged" href=""> </xref> событие <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> класса.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property gets a new instance of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> or a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.

You can obtain the current state of the audio input using the `AudioState` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Вы можете получить текущее состояние ввода с помощью аудио `AudioState` свойство <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>или <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>классы.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the new state of audio input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Получает новое состояние звукового ввода в распознаватель.

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property contains one of three values from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Свойство AudioState содержит одно из трех значений из <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>перечисления.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of audio input after a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Состояние звукового ввода после <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged"> </xref> или <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged"> </xref> события.
